attributes.value: Sees family as one of the most important things in life
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Never becomes angry
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Is stingy with resources on projects and refuses to expend any extra effort
Is unfriendly and disagreeable
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Always presents herself as extravagantly as possible, displaying a magnificent image to the world
Has an active sense of humor
Is somewhat scatterbrained
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is very rarely moved by curiosity
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Tends not to reveal personal information
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Flimsy
Little willpower
An iffy memory
A little difficulty with words
A great musical sense
